amendment.description: Amendment denies FY 1997 cost-of-living allowances to Members of Congress, senior executive branch officials, and Federal judges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to deny any cost-of-living (COLA) to Members of Congress, senior executive branch officials, and federal judges during FY 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Metcalf amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 352 - 67 (Roll no. 317).
